name: X-Project
description:
A simple turn based strategy game with one level. It was made using CodeMonkeys Unity Turn-Based strategy game course.

This project has some small visual changes and some extra features, such as a main menu. As of right now, this is just a prototype for a future project that follow the same base. Any bugs and error you find just comment or enter in contact to let me know.

Controls: 

W.A.S.D - Moves the camera

Q & E - Rotates the camera

Mouse Scroll Whell - Camera Zoom
